GSD.description:
bpf: Add oversize check before call kvcalloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.70 by commit 6345a0bee80139ea00a341c4202ebfd1534b5eb0. For more details please see the references link.
